column1: When are public information films going to be screened on TV on how not to spread & self isolate from the Covid19? We used to have PIF on our TVs back in the 70s/80s/90s why not know?

Mikel Arteta testing positive for Coronavirus is probably an indicator that it's much more wide spread already than the government care to admit, note how ministers and celebrity sports people have immediate access to a proper test
